title: october 17: when the earth quaked for baseball
description:
October 17th was the day that shook the World... Series. On today’s episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia explains why the 1989 World Series game is now dubbed as the “earthquake series” and the aftermath that came with it. Ten years later the world was shook again. Well, maybe not the entire world but a small crowd in Barnstaple, England thought they were going to a secret show to see one of the smoothest criminals in music. The crime - it was an imposter. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
